dcterms:creator: H. Chen
Z. Shi
dcterms:description: The LEVIR-CD dataset is a large-scale building change detection dataset that covers 20 different cities in the US, including images of 0.5m spatial resolution with more than 30,000 change buildings. The dataset consists of 3,167, 436, and 935 pairs for training, validation, and testing, respectively.
dcterms:title: LEVIR-CD dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Alonso-González
C. López-Martínez
K. P. Papathanassiou
I. Hajnsek
dcterms:description: The CDD dataset contains 16,000 season-varying image pairs of spatial resolution ranging from 0.03m to 1m, including general change objects of diverse sizes, such as cars, roads, and buildings.
dcterms:title: CDD dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Yang
et al.
dcterms:description: The SECOND dataset is a semantic change detection benchmark containing 30 types of semantic change information across 6 land-cover categories, with 4662 image pairs of size 512x512.
dcterms:title: SECOND dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Gupta
et al.
dcterms:description: The xBD dataset is designed for assessing building damage from satellite imagery, focusing on detecting and classifying buildings into different damage statuses.
dcterms:title: xBD dataset
